subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Bethpage Black earned the golf community’s respect in 2002; now the U.S.G.A. has scaled back its severity and Rees Jones, the golf architect, thinks the course will be a bit more forgiving.
snippet: Bethpage Black earned the golf community’s respect in 2002; now the U.S.G.A. has scaled back its severity and Rees Jones, the golf architect, thinks the course will be a bit more forgiving.
